snippet: In collaboration with Boston's Museum of Fine Arts, the Musee d'Orsay examines the often-overlooked nudes of Edgar Degas in the remarkable exhibition "Degas and the Nude," which will be held through July 1.
abstract: In collaboration with Boston's Museum of Fine Arts, the Musee d'Orsay examines the often-overlooked nudes of Edgar Degas in the remarkable exhibition "Degas and the Nude," which will be held through July 1.

headline.main: In Paris, Degas and the Nude
